thread.title: BRIEF-Frontfour Capital Group Comments On Recent Developments Related To Obsidian Energy

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Frontfour Capital Group Comments On Recent Developments Related To Obsidian Energy

organizations.name: brief-frontfour capital group comments on recent developments related to obsidian energy

text:
Jan 17 (Reuters) - Obsidian Energy Ltd:
* FRONTFOUR CAPITAL GROUP LLC COMMENTS ON RECENT DEVELOPMENTS RELATED TO OBSIDIAN ENERGY
* FRONTFOUR CAPITAL - BELIEVES “SIGNIFICANT OVERHAUL” OF OBSIDIAN IS NECESSARY, INCLUDING STREAMLINING OF PORTFOLIO VIA DISPOSITIONS
* FRONTFOUR - CONSIDERING SEEKING CHANGES TO COMPOSITION OF OBSIDIAN BOARD AT 2018 ANNUAL MEETING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
